Name: prop
Desc: Gets or sets a property on the nodes.
Long Desc: The prop method provides a way to access or modify DOM element properties (not attributes). When called with only a property name, it gets the property value from the first element in the collection. When called with both a property name and value, it sets that property on all elements in the collection. This is particularly useful for working with boolean properties like 'checked', 'disabled', or 'selected', as well as for accessing native DOM properties like 'scrollTop' or 'innerHTML'.
